title: Why isn't there a Team builder in ranked matches ?
body: I'm sure this question has been asked before but I was wondering why there isn't a team builder in ranked .Because I know we've all had the mid or feed ect, I personally  don't mind playing any roll and I understand its good to have people to learn new rolls  but in the event of say last pick getting a sup only too find out they don't have a sup or an ADC who doesn't have an ADC would hinder a match too the point where your not being matched via skill but by what roll you get in the champion select. I'm not QQ'ing about not playing my favorite roll in fact I enjoy most rolls but I'm sure that getting a Russian roulette of players    getting rolls often hinders the game.

replies.body: This is something Riot is working on but the thing you have to remember is that TB and ranked are two completely different breeds. Getting them to work together is difficult and obviously takes a lot of time to work out how it would be done. Basically, be patient.

It wouldn't work because:
1) You won't be able to ban champions
2) You also won't be able to see the enemy teams choices.

If you were going to just straight out combine them, true, however Riot **IS** currently working on a way to have the two together without taking away from the "draft pick" style of ranked. It's possible that it will become "pick position and role" then it finds 9 other people then you go through a draft style champion select. Either way it will be interesting to see what they come up with.
Ok, well good luck riot, I guess.

The queues might do some weird stuff with team MMR.

They would have to rework the team builder itself so you can have a captain banning .
